website_summaries.verdict: A high quality choice, with an appealing design. The adjustable microphone is an appreciated touch.
pros: We thought the metal and bright blue details gave the X-40 a sleek, appealing design
The padding around the head and ears was soft and remained comfortable for a long period of time
We loved that the microphone was adjustable, so you can twist it closer to your mouth if needed
The audio quality in both the mic and ear pieces was crisp and clear
The cord was extra long – providing a wide range of motion
cons: Microphone easily picks up background noise, which could be distracting when gaming with others

customer_reviews.title: Nice headset, made with solid Materials. Sound is loud and clear.
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a great gaming headset and this one is such a good value with decent sound quality. My nephew is getting into PC gaming and will be getting him a pair as well. I have spent upwards of $150 before on some Logitech ones and these hold up to the same quality as those. Great as a gift or for yourself. Game On everyone. Gamertag: Clownfish210
customer_reviews.author: candido ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sound, Awesome Mic, Would recommend 10/10
customer_reviews.text: This is the best affordable headset you can get. I got 2 of them, one for myself and the other for my best friend. The microphone is so clear it sounds like I was talking to him in the same room. The surround sound actually helps when you are in game because you can actually pick up on your objectives sound. P.S. If you are a PS4 or an Xbox One user I would recommend getting a USB extension cord. This is optional because the only reason to get the extension is to get the LED to work.
customer_reviews.author: Noah Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expensive Name Brand
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for a month. Replaced a $235.00 name brand headset with this one and I like this one better! Use it primarily as a telephone headset with my home wireless phone system and a 2.5 mm adapter. This headset sounds different but is louder than the expensive one. Also works well plugged-in to a computer, my Xbox. and my cell phone. I especially like the no-grab cord. If you want to use this headset with a home phone system with a 2.5 mm jack on the handset this adapter works:  And don't forget to adjust any equalizer (treble/bass) setting on the phone handset to provide the best sound for your ears.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Hill

customer_reviews.title: Reliable headset for gaming and calls
customer_reviews.text: I got this headset for my daughter. At first I was just looking for a cheap one that could be used for gaming and messenger calls. I was happily surprised by three quality of build and sound. It is no Bose noise-cancellation but it quieted the room significantly and calls were crystal clear. No drivers were needed and worked perfectly on both Mac and Windows. It is USB powered, so make sure you have one extra USB port near the audio plug. It also comes with a long two year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Tkon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Value and Unbeatable Quality.
customer_reviews.text: The quality is the first thing you will notice upon unboxing this gorgeous headset. The next thing you will notice is the sound quality and bass response once you put them on. In addition, you will also notice the comfortable fit of this amazing headset, which will lend itself to hours of game play. The value, quality, and overall aesthetics of this headset cannot be matched. I am sure you can find better headsets, but only if you spend two to three times as much.
customer_reviews.author: ATB_Williams

customer_reviews.title: Slick gaming headset that won't break the bank!
customer_reviews.text: Finally!!!! A headset that can compete woth Turtle Beach for a fraction of the price! I was a little hesitant at first due to such a cheap price to buy, but after gaming for 20 hours I must say it's perfect. It's very comfortable, sound is great, and microphone works perfectly. I would definitely recommend, I use with my xbox one!
customer_reviews.author: PristineLogic

customer_reviews.title: We bought a USB extender so he can use the lights from the couch and he thinks they look awesome. He says the sound is incredible as is ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband for his Xbox and PS4. He loves them! We bought a USB extender so he can use the lights from the couch and he thinks they look awesome. He says the sound is incredible as is the microphone. He also can’t hear anything when they’re on. I have to tap his shoulder to get his attention.
customer_reviews.author: K hanks

customer_reviews.title: They are designed pretty well, look great
customer_reviews.text: At first glance you think the headphones look solid. They are designed pretty well, look great, has blue lighting and fits perfect over the ear. . Had a few issues at first with the headset. Not sure if I got a defective headset or if this is the norm. Yes, i checked my mic settings and I was having trouble with the mic but the sound was great. Turns out I had a defective headset and the great team at Bengoo dispatched a replacement headset right away. I really do love the design, the way it feels, and comfort. I wear these all day long without any issues or discomfort to my ears. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Pan

customer_reviews.title: Great.. at least for seven weeks then it stopped working altogether. But then...Above and beyond Customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 8 weeks ago. Looked really cool out of the package. The microphone had great sound. However, a week ago the microphone stopped working. Then yesterday the earphones also stopped working. Others have experienced the same thing. Checked all of the connections. Must be an internal wiring problem. Even though it was technically past the return date, I contacted the company and they offered to replace or refund no questions asked. My rating subsequently went from 2 stars to 5 star review because of their great customer service for standing by their product.
customer_reviews.author: Case-collector

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product and costumer service
customer_reviews.text: Horrible headphone set. Bought this for my nephew for Christmas and they stopped working like 10 mins after using. His friends said they could hear a loud humming/beeping noise and his voice sounded super tinny/crackley. When I contacted the seller for help or posable exchange, they were no help at all. They just kept wanting me to reset them, with a reset button that does not exist. If I could give ZERO stars I would... Don’t wast your money!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Beck

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it for a week and been using it 6-8 hours a day. Very impressed. Only thing I can say bad is that there’s way too much extra wire if you’re looking to connect your headset to your controller. Looks like it’s designed to go from headset to console. I have mine going from headset to controller headset adapter. Sound great, surround works well. For the price I’m very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Ben MBark

customer_reviews.title: I bought 2 and neither one worked and neither did the replacement ones! DON'T BUY it.
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy these, I bought 2 and neither of them worked, requested replacements, and they didn't work either. DON'T BUY THEM THEY ARE TERRIBLE!!! UPDATE: Today, 12/20/19 they sent me an email offering me $25.00 if I would remove this bad review!!! UMMM no thank you, your product stinks and this review will be here forever!! Shame on you for trying to buy me!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love these! For the price they are so comfortable, and the sound is top quality. You can hear enemies creeping around corners behind you, and music sounds crystal clear. Definitely a good, sound, purchase. No pun intended. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jake Style

customer_reviews.title: Breaks shortly after warranty, seller unresponsive
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I have bought 2 of these and both broke about a month after using. Both headset's mic broke. I tried to return through Amazon but it is just beyond warranty and they recommended contacted the seller. I emailed them a week ago and haven't heard anything. Super sad children at our house! Reading through the comments it seems that a lot of people are having problems with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sharkfish

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, poor audio quality, weak mic, shallow ear cups
customer_reviews.text: The padding around the headband is comfy and the ear cups block outside sound well, but that is about the only thing good about this headset. I've been using them for about a week, and they're not comfortable for more than a few minutes because of the weight of the headset and the shallowness of the ear cups. Also, my friends hear a lot of static from my headset, and even the audio through the headset sounds muffled. The mic isn't very strong either. And the weight of the cord is pulling at the jack which I'm worried is going to damage the port over time. Overall, I'm disappointed with this headset, and I'm surprised at its high rating.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Kitti

customer_reviews.title: Great headset, definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I use these for my PS4 and my friends comment on how clear my voice/mic quality was. Sound was amazing, I could hear exactly where an enemy was no matter the game I chose. The lights on it are great, you need to plug in the USB cord for the lights to work, but I just use a USB extention cord to plug into a USB wall outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Nice Isaiah

customer_reviews.title: Great for gamers at a great price...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 12 year old gamer for Christmas. He says that he loves these and that they are extremely comfortable to wear. They do not hurt his ears after wearing for a long period of time. He says that his scores have gotten higher and that he is better with his games because he can hear his enemies creeping up on him now. It's only been a few days but he loves these much more than his Turtle Beach ones.
customer_reviews.author: Rain A.

customer_reviews.title: WORST HEADSET DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I bought these back in March and honestly, they were pretty good all till now. They started fuzzing in and out and as of today they don’t want to work at all. They’re super uncomfortable around the ears especially if you wear glasses. I feel like I can buy this kind of headset from a 5 below. Not worth the buy do not spend your money and save it and buy a headset actually worth it. If I could give it a 0 I would. UPDATE: They decided to send me an email To my PERSONAL EMAIL and not through Amazon messages. (So far at 5 emails)
customer_reviews.author: Mya

customer_reviews.title: Great headset for the $$
customer_reviews.text: Great headset for the price. I have honestly purchased many headsets for $150 plus dollars and they just dont seem to last. Was leary to buy this one because it was much cheaper than the usual ones i have bought but so far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Mamagunch79

customer_reviews.title: Price and quality are great
customer_reviews.text: I use these for a PS4 and have been very pleased. The price and quality are great. I have other wireless headsets that are good as well that I use for Xbox but at 6 times the price. I have played for hours and they still remain comfortable. I would recommend these to anyone purchasing for someone else. They will be happy with your selection.
customer_reviews.author: John Tonini

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: This headset randomly stopped working (the mic) within 2 months. My son could still hear his friends, but the mic stopped working and they couldn’t hear him. We checked all settings and tried other headsets we have and all worked fine (sound and mic both) so it’s not our Nintendo console or settings. There was no option on Amazon to return so I would not recommend this item at all. Obviously very cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for anything, and it's been 9 months!
customer_reviews.text: So, I got this about 9 months ago, and I'm still loving it. The sound is really, really good. I know this is a "gaming headset", but I use it for anything from listening to music(very deep sub-woofer level bass!), to using on my guitar amp for silent practice, to of course, gaming. People hear me very well, as I talk trash to the noobs. And I can hear them crying with the greatest of clarity. I would highly recommend this headset!
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: sooper for zoom
customer_reviews.text: I am a pandemic lockup worker at home. I love the padding on these. They are very comfortable. I am a 60 YO office worker who spends about two or three hours on conference calls every day. I love these. The illuminated sides are't necessary for me. But, they do light up my office with I walk in in the evening. I do recommend office workers who are at home get these. the sound is excellent and balanced. The noise cancellation isn't as good as some. But, since they are worn as "over" the ear, they do pretty good. And, when family walks into the room, they know I'm on a call.
customer_reviews.author: oribhabor

customer_reviews.title: Great headset for gaming and Zoom meetings (with led off)
customer_reviews.text: This headset is great for gaming and Zoom meetings. Work all day with the led USB plug unplugged and everyone hears me clearly, without the colorful distraction. Game all night and I stay connected with my team over discord. I previously had a Logitech headset that worked great until the mute/unmute button broke. This one has a slider instead of a button, which hopefully will last longer. I like this one better because it is over the ear instead on the ear, so I stay more comfortable over a longer period of time. It also creates a better seal around my ears for surround sound.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Kringle

customer_reviews.title: Good Headset
customer_reviews.text: This headset is pretty basic. It's durable feeling and seems like it will hold up well. The two different plug in option can be annoying but that's only because it was used for PS4 in the controller and with that you can't connect the USB. That's not a big deal as it seems to only be for the lights. PC option it worked great and the lights were nice. Sound quality is great but if someone else is in the room they can hear the sounds from the headset. Microphone works well also. The cushion is also nice. And, I am picky with the ear part and this was perfectly fine against the ears. Solid headset for the price.
customer_reviews.author: M&J

customer_reviews.title: Sound and Comfort
customer_reviews.text: My son has Autism, so need to find him a GOOD noise cancellation, and really comfortable Headphones, for the virtual learning, this headphones are amazing, the sound is great, after my husband and my older Son tried them, I need to ores 2 more for gaming, They toll me there are better than super expensive brands.... So highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Jorge & Monika Jara

customer_reviews.title: Don't know how these headphones got 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter that is a PC gamer. (Daughter's words) The sound is fine, nothing too special and it came with everything but I spent well over an hour trying to get the mic to work. Even when it started to work, the other person could barely hear me and the mic would constantly cut out. My other way more expensive headphones were awesome till my bird chewed the mic . . . hence why I got these ones. Made a mistake buying cheap headphones. Get what you pay for. If your a PC gamer, spend the money and get better quality ones.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Wood

customer_reviews.title: Very nice headphones for the price
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great so far. We haven't had a lot of opportunity to use them yet as I purchased them in advance of my children beginning virtual learning for this school year. We did test them out with the laptop be and the sound quality was very good. They feel comfortable after using them for a short period of time. I will provide an update on long wear comfortability and the microphone once when we have a more opportunity to use it. As well as when my son uses it, as I'm sure he will, for playing Fortnite with his friends.
customer_reviews.author: ALE in VA

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable, nice padding all the way around the ear and at the top of your head. Sound quality is great, rich tones for music and clear voice when playing online. Overall the finish of these look great, nice detail in the metal, fabrics and foam all make these look much more expensive. Came with adapters for multiple hookups, most conveniently is the 3.5 jack. the Mic is adjustable to fit right where I need it and won't get in the way or pick up too much feedback. I'm using this headset on a Switch console and its been great.
customer_reviews.author: Ben W

customer_reviews.title: Surround sound, noise canceling- GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Just received these headphones and have used them several times so far- noise cancellation is great, surround sound sounds like you are right there inside the game. Not able to comment on the LED portion as I don’t have a USB port on my Xbox one controller for that option to work. I like how the headphones have the stainless steel, a movable mic that you can move up and down when in use and not in use, sturdy headphones ( have a toddler who is sneaky and got a hold of these and tossed them around for a good 10 mins) these held up and still work like a charm!!
customer_reviews.author: nHolder91

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but very disappointing that it stopped working after about two months
customer_reviews.text: This headset is very comfortable, but it did not last long and we take good care of our belongings. We had only had this headset for about two months, and it quit transmitting the sound from conversations and the games. You couldn't hear anything through the headset despite seeing if there was any way to fix it. These headsets should hold up a lot longer. There was also distortion on the sounds when you could hear things before it completely stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: This thing is legit
customer_reviews.text: This is really robust and well made headset. It works6 well for anyone working from home or learning from home who needs a headset with a microphone. Perfect for zoom calls and other video conferencing. If everyone in your household wore something like this you could easily all sit at the same table and work independently without disruption.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES C HUIE

customer_reviews.title: Kid is happy
customer_reviews.text: My boy saved his money to get these. He loves the steel look and the lights. I tried them with my iPad and liked the sound performance. Used them in FaceTime and apparently the mic was clear. The mic can bend to your mouth - which is very helpful. Comes with a mic/phones split for older PCs - which is handy. They seem to fit his head ok - and he is only 7 (even though I think they look a little large on him...) He could not be more happy with them - and the price was great also. Good product Bengoo!
customer_reviews.author: LanceSword

customer_reviews.title: Great for Online Gaming!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones for my 12-year old because of the great reviews and the great price. The reviews were spot on - these headphones are super comfortable on my son's ears, they're flexible, light, and the sound quality coming in to the ear phones is great. His friends also told him that the voice quality from his microphone is so much better. My son appreciates how the headset is flexible, the volume button is very user friendly and easy to maneuver without having to look at it. Overall, great purchase for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Aldama

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming headset
customer_reviews.text: I got this headset for my PS4. It is very comfortable. The leather around the ears makes it more comfortable for wearing for long period of time. The set up was super easy, all I had to do was plug it in. The sound quality is great. I hear my friends and music very clearly now. The mic works great as well. The first thing my friends said to me was that they were hearing me louder and clearer before. It also picks up less background noise than the headset that comes with the system. I am very happy with the headset for the price.
customer_reviews.author: David Stolz

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Work, 2” cord so impossible to use anyway
customer_reviews.text: Mic did not work right out of the box. Cord about 2 inches long!!! No way to use without your face crammed against the screen. Just ridiculous. This was a Christmas gift and I was so disappointed as was my son when he tried to use it. Amazon had UPS pick it up for free yesterday afternoon and this morning I got an email saying I have been fully refunded for the purchase. Great customer service, but poor product.
customer_reviews.author: bethyb

customer_reviews.title: Sound & mic cutting out intermittently on multiple Xbox One controllers & consoles
customer_reviews.text: Love this headset- when it's working. When (wired) connected to PC or iPhone it works great and consistently. When (wired) connected to Xbox One controller, both sound and mic cut out intermittently. We've tried this on multiple consoles and new controllers, and can't determine a rhyme or reason for it. Sad, because when it works it's great. But when it cuts out in the middle of a first-person shooter, good luck living very long without ears or mouth! Time to look elsewhere for a dependable headset.
customer_reviews.author: missionmatt

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this product in January 2020 and my son was happy with the quality (especially at an affordable price for him!). The original headset stopped producing sound on one side after about 6 months. We ended up just buying a different one but the company noticed our review about the durability issue and was happy to send us a replacement headset (we should have just asked!). The new one has been working great! I will update about durability later on but I am hoping we just happened to get a dud and the new one will be lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Mom's Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Great quality headphones for good price
customer_reviews.text: These headphones were purchased because of their multiple use capabilities. My son enjoys that he can use these for his online classes, xbox, my phone, etc. The volume is pretty loud and they can cancel out sound somewhat also the wire to plug it in is a nice long length. The only downside is that you have to plug in the USB in order for the lights to work so if your not using a computer chances are you won't be able to have the lights on unless you externally plug them in.
customer_reviews.author: nafiza rosario

customer_reviews.title: I did all the research so you dont have to. THIS IS THE ONE TO BUY!
customer_reviews.text: A great gaming headset! I researched all the options, and this one did not disappoint! It has great sound quality and the style and fit are awesome. The volume buttons are easy and work great when switching between live stream gaming and just regular play with no conversations. The Mic can be muted to have a personal conversation, and there is none of that annoying echo. If I ever need another headset, or if I want to suggest one to a friend, I would definitely reccomend BENGOO.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne S.

customer_reviews.title: Deceiving company, but a nice headset
customer_reviews.text: I’m disappointed with this company since they promised to send a “free” red headset and they don’t. It’s been two months since my original message and I haven’t received the supposedly gift as a reward for my review. Original post: Excellent quality for the price paid. I have received it yesterday and tested it today. Clean sound in and out. My peers and friends like the headset a lot, specially the lights. It fits nicely and it feels better than expected. At this time, I am really satisfied. We’ll see when I use it for my online classes next week. Hope it works nicely as today in an online meeting I had.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp set of headphones
customer_reviews.text: When my son first opened the box, he was super excited to see a nice SHARP set of headphones. It's made out of a very good quality. I bought it for my son to he's able to use it for his digital school zoom meetings and video lessons. The microphone works perfect and my son loves the fact that he can adjust the volume on the headphones cord rather than the keyboard. After my husband saw how cool and sharp it looks, he wants to order himself a set for his conference calls for work lol. Anyway, this is just a perfect set of headphones! :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stop searching. Just get these 😍😍
customer_reviews.text: Guys. Omg. So I just got into gaming not too long ago, and I finally decided I needed a headset to talk shit and play with others. These are crazy good!! The sound is so 👌🏻 and the durability!! My nephew sometimes uses them (11 and he can get kinda rowdy) and they last! They’re literally made to withstand this stuff. Very flexible. Comes with everything you need too! Microphone (friends asked me where I got mine 😁), little thingy to plug it into your controller (PS4 personally) and extra little cords that I don’t even know what to do with! But I have them! These headphones, and this company is awesome dude. Love them! ❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Berry

customer_reviews.title: Good headsets and good snug fit
customer_reviews.text: Headphones for the price are actually pretty good. They are solid and have good sound. They might feel a little tight on bigger heads because of cushions. They are well made and the only complaint is sometimes when i bumped the 3.5mm connection it would sound like static and the sound that other players heard sometimes got corrupted. Another small issue was they are not glasses friendly because of the snug fit. Overall for the price they sound and feel good for the most part and i love that they have the mute and volume button right on the wire.
customer_reviews.author: Jaz

customer_reviews.title: Surround sound doesn’t work, impossible to tell the direction of sounds in games.
customer_reviews.text: The speakers on the pair I received seem to be wired in reverse. Sounds from the right come out of the left speaker, which makes it impossible to use for shooters, or any game with stereo sound. I don’t have this issue with any other headphones I’ve used, so I know it’s not my settings. I would just wear them backwards, but the mike only goes in one direction. Everything else about them is good. They seem durable, sound quality is fine, and the mike works well. I find them a little uncomfortable, but not bad. If you don’t get a lemon it’s a good deal, but I learned the hard way why these are so cheap.
customer_reviews.author: S-Class

customer_reviews.title: Buy them, you won't regret it! Great product, reasonable price !
customer_reviews.text: Really great sound quality, arrived on time. Works perfectly on IPAD- but not sure about laptop, may be that my laptop jack is broken or a different size - because it was excellent on my daughter's iPad mini - Bought it for Zoom/Virtual classes. The lights only work if you plug in to a USB, which is actually pretty cool. Would hate to have to *charge* them.. and wireless is overrated- especially since the sound quality can diminish with Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie B

customer_reviews.title: Can hear the footsteps from behind
customer_reviews.text: Started playing Valorant and needed a better headset to hear footsteps more precisely and these do just that. Which immediately helped to get my kda up. They really cup around your ears and do a great job of isolating left to right, which was the issue I had with my last set. They're comfortable and I like the flexible mic, which my team says I sound crystal clear now. Overall great purchase for the price point. Highly recommend as a budget purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a headset to make it easier to play games with friends from afar (via Discord and other means). So far they seem to be working great! I have done an initial mic test via making a Google Hangouts call, and there was some very minor static, but overall the call quality was good. They aren't perfect noise cancelling, but they do reduce background noise, which is very helpful for holding conversations. Definitely pleased with my purchase and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Decent headset for the money
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son as a headset to use for both school and gaming on his xbox one. I mainly got it because it has the mute button for the mic which is really nice. The sound quality isn't bad at all, even though he'd like to have more bass ( I prefer he doesn't). I also wish the light worked by charging the headset because the USB only works on the PC unless he buys an adapter and it's kind of just hanging there when he's gaming. Compared to his other two headsets the microphone seems to be way better. All in all I'd buy again, pretty decent headset.
customer_reviews.author: mandy101

customer_reviews.title: Multifunctional and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Okay I have tried several different headphones for my son and he always complains that they hurt his ears. Well, I discovered these and he absolutely loves them. Uses them for gaming as well as for distance learning as they can easily be plugged into his laptop and the microphone is a plus as well as the manual mute on and off switch. They cover his ears well and are lightweight. I am very satisfied I ran across these!
customer_reviews.author: Mirela

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: They look great and my son's love them. All their friends have this brand and suggested them as well as being top rated when I did research. We sturdy and should last. They don't cancel out all noise but at least 50%. I didn't mind that this, this way they can still hear when I yell for them.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price! Bass is way better than the price would have you think
customer_reviews.text: So I've tried a lot of headsets throughout the years, and, for the price, this one cannot be beat. First of all, it has easy to use inline controls so I can easily adjust the sound or mute my mic, both very important features to have. Secondly, the bass is sounds so much better than many headsets that cost up to twice as much. Additionally, this headset looks nicer than some of the headsets I've used in the past. Finally, it works fine using just the six cable, so you can have it directly plugged into your controller.
customer_reviews.author: Yoda's wisdom

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset, Plenty of Volume
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This is much nicer looking than I expected! Pictures don't do it justice. It looks like a piece that would sell for a lot more. Only issue I'm having is that the volume is VERY quiet. If the manufacturer could contact me and let me know if there's something I can do to fix that, I'd appreciate it and adjust my review. Thanks! Edit: not sure what I did wrong the first time but the volume works fine. It actually gets much louder than I could possibly turn it and I'm hard of hearing, so that says a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Hill

customer_reviews.title: Decent sound quality but...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I got a defective item but the mic would only pick up my voice if it was directly in front of my mouth. Even worse, the mic wasn’t long enough to reach in front of my mouth. What kind of design is this? In order for the mic to reach I had to shift the left ear pad so it was basically on my cheek. Super frustrating. It was only $30 so I guess I shouldn’t have expected a ton but I don’t understand where all the positive reviews are coming from. It did have decent sound, though. Will be returning for a different headset with a better design.
customer_reviews.author: Taz

customer_reviews.title: Switch compatible
customer_reviews.text: My son just got this, so far he really like them they are better than a $99 my other son bought🤦‍♀️ And they work with his switch too!
customer_reviews.author: ximena lizarro

customer_reviews.title: Overall great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way they look and the quality is amazing...this is my second buy. I bought the first one for my hubby and he bragged how great these sound and after he had me listen with his headphone I purchased one for me...just got it today. Fast shipping! Wow these headsets are beautiful especially the led lighting. They truly takes our gaming experience to a whole other level...with the surround sound, we feel like we are inside the game lol.
customer_reviews.author: clb8372

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset but a bit big for my adult small head.
customer_reviews.text: I always have this issue. I would say it is not to the fault of the manufacturer. I have a small head and small ears and it is hard to find headphones that fit my head and ears. This headset does not fit my small head very well yet the sound quality, build quality, and the microphone works great! This is an excellent gaming headset without the big price. It has great base and played PUBG and Royal Realm without any issue. I would recommend this headset to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: C.Beech

customer_reviews.title: My first gaming headset and it's amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect this amount of quality from a $25 item but this has exceeded my expectations! The bass is amazing and the sound quality was clear. The microphone was tested on my laptop and even though it may be away from my mic, the flexible band allowed me to put it closer and my voice was clear to others in the online game. I am very happy that this was my first gaming headset purchase and anyone that is looking for a budget headset, this is what I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: slcanas716

customer_reviews.title: Gaming
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: When we set it up with his Xbox it did not work. He could hear everything but was unable to communicate with others. It said it needed another update as well as another piece, and it did not work. So it maybe a great buy but not for your Xbox. DO NOT buy it, we had to return it! This is a great product better than what I was expecting. The sound quality is great and it blocks out the noise around you. Awesome product for anyone who is into gaming products.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Restrepo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution to online classroom noise, 3rd grader loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got this so my son can do virtual classroom, after one day of having to hear his whole class talking over the teacher. Life. Saver. Those poor teachers. She has 20+ 3rd graders, many of whom have never touched a computer before. Anyway, these fit him well with room to grow, the sound is great and he isn't bothered by my office sounds while wearing them. Works on both his chromebook and desktop computer, AND his iPad. Score!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Wittenauer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: These earphones fit both my adult head and my son's (whom I bought this for) head perfectly. The sound quality is excellent and his friends indicated that they heard him (throug the microphone) very well. I love how it looks when you plug in the usb port (making the headset glow a really cool blue). It's a bit like Tron ;0) Not only WOULD I buy this again, I'll be getting the red model for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Gaming Headset
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable fitting allowing for extended wear and the sound quality is awesome with equally great noise isolation. It would be great if the lights did not require usb connection Perhaps find a way to make them completely wireless while keeping this great sound quality This headset is great as it works for my 10 year old son and 12 year old daughter too Great inexpensively priced set of gaming headphones that anyone would be proud to own
customer_reviews.author: marstan

customer_reviews.title: Goes beyond expectations for a headset!
customer_reviews.text: The headset was for my daughter to use playing her PS4 and she is be happy with them. She says they fit extremely well, the sound is phenomenal and she would recommend to everyone. We believe they are a better headset than can be purchased in the stores. Value exceeds the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very meh head set
customer_reviews.text: Mehhh if i was as into gaming as I use to be I'd 100% return this. Its not noise canceling at all doesnt fit snug on your ears. Also makes a fuzzy noise with the lobby music. It only lights up with the USB plugged in so doesn't really work to well for consoles. Luckily I already had an adapter so didn't need to get one. Will probably be sticking with my razer kraken headset.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Headset!
customer_reviews.text: So far they are great. Love the blue LED lighting. It works on all the game consoles and all their devices. The controls are simple with a volume adjuster and switch to mute the microphone. The pads are soft and are pretty comfortable. Voice quality is good. I did listen to some music and I like the audio quality. My other friends and team mates can hear me. I even use it for work but mostly for gaming. Overall, given the price, quality of the materials and good sound, I would recommend this for the average gamer. They're definitely a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Virgil

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I use these headphones a lot, normally headphones don't last a long time for me, but these have lasted me a long time. The microphone attached to the headphones works really well. I also loved the 2 way cord (One for headphones and one for Microphone) It comes in handy If I need to use a different microphone at the moment. These are a good set of headphones!
customer_reviews.author: brian a.

customer_reviews.title: Great headset!
customer_reviews.text: Nice headset, I’ve had it for a few weeks now and the sound quality is outstanding for the price! I did have a little issue with the cable connection to my Xbox controller, minor pop/cracking noise when I’d move around, but really not something that has made me want to return them. I really was impressed on sound quality and comfort!
customer_reviews.author: Blackwell 315

customer_reviews.title: Great Entry Level/Budget Headset
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my brother for Christmas because he plays online games, and his computer is in a common room of the house. I tried them myself, and these have great sound and noise isolation. The USB cable is just to power the LEDs on the headset, so don't assume that they won't work without that being plugged in. They'll work great for console and mobile gaming as well, but you might lose out on the LED lights and visual effects. The mic is very flexible and works well. I definitely recommend these for anyone needing a headset for gaming on a budget or just getting started with streaming gameplay.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey Gasca

customer_reviews.title: Mic works, game sound does not...
customer_reviews.text: The mic works fine, but you can not hear the game at all (PS4). How can I contact the company for assistance? I’d be happy to change my review if someone can help me get this product to work. I don’t know if I have a defective product or if there is something to troubleshoot to fix this (I couldn’t find anything on the product site to resolve this). Otherwise as it stands now this product is unusable.
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: My kids love the headset
customer_reviews.text: My youngest son received these as a gift from his grandparents for his birthday...he seems to like them and plugs them into his xbox remote. Fast forward, my oldest son requested headphones like his little brother has for Christmas...so, I decide to test this headset out myself to see what all the fuss is about and the headphones are comfortable, sound is amazing, there's an option to contol and mute the volume, and they seem durable. My other son wanted a headset for his phone, so I tried them out on my android and it was amazing, so he's getting these for Christmas, too.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy and Craig

customer_reviews.title: “GREAT” gaming headset!
customer_reviews.text: Great headset. Very comfortable ear pads, the mic is clear when speaking and the sound.....very good. Mine lights up blue and is really cool. Liked them so well, I ordered another set for my grandson. He loves them too. But is having trouble sometimes with the mic not working. He has figured out that it’s not the headset but his Nintendo Switch that is having issues.
customer_reviews.author: Beaker

customer_reviews.title: This company has a future generation in headsets and mouses
customer_reviews.text: The earmuffs felt weird and got kinda warm in my ears but other that that, This was great! i mean the microphone was high quality other than my old earbuds that my friends couldn't hear my voice in and the head piece was easily adjustable the only other complaint i have is that i thought the article about the microphone turning 360 degrees was misleading because i thought they had meant that whenever you had bent it it would stay that way until you bent it back the microphone was originally but other than that the product was great in general.
customer_reviews.author: B.Doerr

customer_reviews.title: headset was very nice lasts sooo long! worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: The headset is great for gaming, streaming I love it until it stopped working and after I wrote a review they were kind enough to send me another pair for free!!! and I am grateful for that. Overall these headphones are definitely worth it and I usually throw my headset and use it pretty roughly (whoops). It is fine after a certain time the cloth on the wiring starting to come off so I had to cut it off but other than that I love these headset is lightweight and doesnt hurt my ears every time I wear it.
customer_reviews.author: miasato

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for/ Not a deal
customer_reviews.text: At first these seemed like decent quality headphones for the price, the mic output wasn’t super great but I was certainly understandable and it allowed me to play my PS4 without disturbing others in the house/room. However after a few months of use the sound quality hasn’t gotten horrific. Static and cutting in and out. There is no way to even listen to just the home screen music without wanting to cut your ears off. Spend a little more money, get a better quality headset for longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Westmoreland Books

customer_reviews.title: Best quality for amazing price
customer_reviews.text: I have had many different headphones, and when you search on Amazon, it gives you about a million choices, so I was nervous when I order these headphones, but I am so happy with them. The noise-canceling is excellent, and the comfort is likely my favorite feature. I love the volume adjust with ease on the cord, and the cable is long enough that I do not ever have to worry about whiplash if I get too far from my computer or controller. I will be buying this brand of headphones for life!
customer_reviews.author: RuizFamily

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and good quality!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Me and my sister play video games together and she says my audio is so well that she could hear me breathing. Of course after that I adjusted the mic further from my mouth. Also, the mic piece is not completely plastic, so it’s very flexible. Allows you to move it any which way and don’t have to worry about it snapping in half. 10/10 recommend.
customer_reviews.author: H.Family

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great While I Used It
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sometime last year and I've used it almost religiously since then. It works very well for what I use it for. Which is gaming every night after work. The noise-canceling is all right. Probably not the best but it works very well for what I would use it for. I've now pasted it to my boyfriend and he loves it to. So I'd say that is the evidence of a good headset right there.
customer_reviews.author: That Sly Fox

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Update: The company reached out and replaced the headset that broke, which is impressive. The headset worked well and I switch between my computer, xbox and PS4. Hopefully the first one was just defective and the replacement continues to work. The headset was nice, while it lasted. Ordered it October 2018 and its already broken. It would hesitate to even consider my usage moderate, so if you're looking for a headset to use daily this wouldn't be good for that. The price point is attractive but unless you're ok with replacing it every 6 months I recommend investing in a somewhat better made headset.
customer_reviews.author: Gen Marceau

customer_reviews.title: Nice headset for Gaming; great sound
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Had great sound, nice bass sound. Good job eliminating background noise. Comfortable (more on this below) overall, and the microphone worked great. Cool lights too. Cons: A little bulkier than I thought; plus, it made my ears sweat a little (I was planning on wearing these all day for work though). I do have big ears which doesn't help of course.
customer_reviews.author: LadyCarolina

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound and Mic Quality
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about these headphones. They can be used on all of my platforms that I play video games on. These headphones also fit just right around my head and they are very comfortable. The sound sounds great on these headphones, and so does the microphone. One thing that I did have to do on my Xbox Controller, was update my controller in setting, so don't forget to do that if you have a new controller. These headphones are great and very useful!
customer_reviews.author: Ron Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Great headset for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Really good for the price. They are very comfortable, although they are a little big on me (I have a really small head though). Sound quality is good. I like how they will work on both of my game systems as well as my son's PC. I thought it was odd that the mic didn't detach but it folds up and you never notice it. I don't use headphones often when gaming so I didn't want to spend much, these were worth the $.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect heads up for online learning as well as gaming
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son to use on his chrome book for this online school situation were in. It works great the sound quality is great he loves that it lights up he couldn’t be more excited to get this. It also will have a dual purpose because when we’re done with all of this online schooling thing he can then use it for his gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Heather bock

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable headsets
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headsets for my son when he plays on the computer and video game. These headsets are perfect because they have the different ports. I like the ears because they are comfortable. The noise is really blocked from him when he is using them. I have to go tap him to get his attention.
customer_reviews.author: Rena A

customer_reviews.title: Quality headset at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Bengoo headset and it did not disappoint! The cushioned padding is very comfortable on the ears, the sound quality is great and the lights are cool according to my teenage son!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing bad to say about the headset and the only reason for the four stars is because I just got them and don't know how long they will last. One of the most surprising things I found out was I got a FREE additional one year warranty without paying. The headset looks great and the price was very good even after looking at a few on Amazon. Turned up the sound and could not hear anything else in the room. Also, it does fit over my ear.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought the headset really for school as kids are learning from home. Noise cancellation is very decent and the quality of the sound is great. Very comfortable to wear! Using the headset with Chromebook. Tested on cellphone jack and it works great; the same goes for his Samsung tablet. 5/5 Stars Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Azurite

customer_reviews.title: volume and microphone control, great sound, well made, soft earpads.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the headphones, I tried them before I gave it to him to check the sound quality and is really good, well made. The only down side is that they are a little heavier than the other headset I had before. I like the fact that I can control the volume and silence the microphone if I want. Comes with usb and a plug splitter for the pc.
customer_reviews.author: Hugo

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth purchasing again
customer_reviews.text: My son is a avid gamer. He's gone through a ton of headsets. He says this one is his favorite so far. He loves the noise cancellation. Today I was vacuuming in the same room he was in and he took them off to tell me he couldn't even hear the vacuum. Not sure on the durability yet as we've only had them for a couple weeks but the seem they're made well. He also likes the colored lights on the sides. Great for the price! We ended up buying another pair for a friends birthday. They were packaged with care and arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: M.Snow

customer_reviews.title: Extremely high quality!
customer_reviews.text: I got this headset at first as a budget headset, just something to use until I have more money, but as soon as I started to use the headset I realized that this is more than just a budget headset. It is a high quality headset, that I use frequently and will not stop using. It is a fantastic headset that I recommend everybody to get!
customer_reviews.author: Cass Fitz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Headset
customer_reviews.text: The sound is amazing! We have no issues with it, when it comes to game play and performance from the earphones. The biggest problem was with the mic! It was cutting in and out!? We adjusted the settings in our console, got it working and it lasted for about a month. Then it just started cutting in and out, so we contacted Bengoo and they got it working for me!
customer_reviews.author: Nicked

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headset
customer_reviews.text: I'm not the type to buy $100 headsets or cheap ones either, I always try to look for a good value and this headset is exactly that. I have a friend who always sounded so clear on his mic with no background noise and this is what he uses so I was sold just on sound alone. I absolutely love that you can control the headset's volume and mute function on the little controller thing that hangs on its cord. The material is also good quality. It's not the cheapest I've found, but when you buy anything cheaper than this price it becomes a gamble anyway. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Bes

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 2 months
customer_reviews.text: This mkc broke in 2 months, I ordered it in June and it broke in early August. Right after the 45 day policy.... the sound quality was good, the comfort was okay, it would start hurting my neck after around 2 hours though.... The mic quality was good, but it broke on it’s own. Edit: Awesome customer service! They said they’d send a new set of headphones right after they confirm the mailing address, and once we receive the headset this is definitely going to be a 5 star headset! Edit: Great service! We got the new headset, and it works perfectly. I’d already ordered a new headset, but my friend needed one so I gave him it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great but
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit heavy on my head. It works so well and it does what it's supposed to do in spades. Unfortunately it is rather heavy and tends to give me a headache if I wear it for extended periods. In every other way it is perfect and it looks great and the sound quality is wonderful. I just wish it were lighter.
customer_reviews.author: D. DeMange Peck

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this item! Perfect for those of us that want something good but affordable. The frame is really solid, mic works like a charm, the lights look cool & don’t blind you. Works great in PS4 & computers (including Mac). It reduces the noise quite well & the mic is really potent. Also is really comfortable on your head and ears. I recommend this 100%
customer_reviews.author: Gianfranco Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Great product and easy setup with 2 year warranty
customer_reviews.text: Great product for price! Only complaint I have is when plugged into the ps2 controller it doesn’t light up like when pc usb is plugged in. Great sound. And clear mic. Comes with a 2 year warranty and some other perks. Very easy to setup and use. Very easy to register and review. Highly recommend this product worth the price and better headset compared to others on the market in same price range. Would purchase other devices from this company in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Lianna

customer_reviews.title: 2 headsets broke within 3 months!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two and both of them broke where it plugs into the controller After 3 months! So disappointed, we don’t plug and unplug them either. If you buy, reinforced the jack wire connector with electrical tape and you should be good, wish I had. No warranty either but that was on me to verify before I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Johansson

customer_reviews.title: He likes it
customer_reviews.text: My son likes it. I swear I already did a review on this lol. But I keep getting emails so I'm doing it again.
customer_reviews.author: perremama

customer_reviews.title: Best affordable gaming headset for price!
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised at the great quality, sound and usability of these gaming headphones. Very nice looking and affordable price! Definitely worth it. Good noise cancellation. Also includes both mic and audio adapters which was a nice surprise.
customer_reviews.author: ndSims025

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! I used them for gaming and the headset felt really comfortable and the quality of sound was amazing. Also, I love the design because it looks really cool. You can also adjust the size of the headphones so anyone can wear them. The mic is also very clear and much better than the mics I have used before. These headphones are amazing and definitely one of the best I have worn. What is great is that it can be used on any device as well such as an iPhone, iPad and any android device. I would certainly recommend it for any pro gamers out there or even for anyone that needs good a quality headset
customer_reviews.author: Raied Dabbagh

customer_reviews.title: That its perfect for gaming!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! Really good mic, really good sound quality. It lights up on pc, not on console though, It comes with 2 headphone plugs, one green and one pink. I had to use the green one but I dont know if it might be different for you. Once again annother great product sold on amazon!
customer_reviews.author: heather

product_meta.title: BENGOO V-4 Gaming Headset for Xbox One, PS4, PC, Controller, Noise Cancelling Over Ear Headphones with Mic, LED Light Bass Surround Soft Memory Earmuffs for PS2 Mac Nintendo 64 Game Boy Advance Games
product_meta.description:
Color:BlueProduct parameters:
Speaker Size: 50mm
Sensitivity: 115+/-3db
Impedance: 20Ω +/-15%
Cable Length: 2.1M+/-0.15
Microphone Impedance: 2.2kΩ
Frequency Range: 20Hz-20 KHz
Microphone Sensitivity: -38+/-3dB
Working Current: ♦Headset Jack: USB+3.5mm 4Pin

Troubleshooting Methods:
【Question：How to use it on PS4?】
1. Please test it with your cellphone before apply the headset on your PS4, to make sure it works well.
2. Insert the headset with 3.5mm jack plug into the Gamepad .
3. Then long press the PS4 button to enter the System Settings.
4. There is a choice "PERIPHERAL MACHINES", choose it and then choose "ADJUST SOUND AND DEVICES", next choose "Output to the headphones", then change it to "All audio".

【Question: With sound but the voice chatting cannot work?】
1.When using the headset, please make sure the tone control microphone switch of headset is turned on, and make sure that the microphone works normally.
2.The headset plug is quadrupolar, single plug type with the function of audio/voice combination, and is application to single-hole audio device. Please make sure that if your device fits the audio/voice combination interface.
3.The headset plug is quadrupolar, single plug type, while your device may be of tripolar interface. 4.With the bisected adapter cable of 3.5mm interface, you can use the 3.5mm dual plug (headphone and microphone jack) interface of the computer. You can enjoy beautiful music and voice chatting at the same time.

Notes:
1.Extra Microsoft adapter (Not Included) is needed when connect with old version Xbox One controller.
2.1-to-2 3.5mm jack splitter cable is needed when you connect with PC if you want to use headphone and microphone at the same time.

Package Lists:
1 * User Manual
1 * Gaming Headset
1 * 1-to-2 3.5mm jack splitter cable
feature_bullets: 【WIDE APPLICATION】 Support PlayStation 4, Xbox One S, PC, Nintendo 3DS, Laptop, PSP, Tablet, iMac, Computer, Mobile Phone. Please note that you need an extra Microsoft Adapter (Not Included) when connecting with an old version Xbox One controller

【SURROUNDING STEREO SUBWOOFER】Clear sound operating strong brass, splendid ambient noise isolation and high precision 40mm magnetic neodymium driver, acoustic positioning precision enhance the sensitivity of the speaker unit, bringing you vivid sound field, sound clarity, shock feeling sound. Perfect for various games like Halo 5 Guardians, Metal Gear Solid, Call of Duty, Star Wars Battlefront, Overwatch, World of Warcraft Legion, etc.

【NOISE ISOLATING MICROPHONE】Headset integrated onmi-directional microphone can transmits high quality communication with its premium noise-concellng feature, can pick up sounds with great sensitivity and remove the noise, which enables you clearly deliver or receive messages while you are in a game. Long flexible mic design very convenient to adjust angle of the microphone.

【GREAT HUMANIZED DESIGN】Superior comfortable and good air permeability protein over-ear pads, muti-points headbeam, acord with human body engineering specification can reduce hearing impairment and heat sweat.Skin friendly leather material for a longer period of wearing. Glaring LED lights desigend on the earcups to highlight game atmosphere.

【EFFORTLESSLY VOLUME CONTROL】High tensile strength, anti-winding braided USB cable with rotary volume controller and key microphone mute effectively prevents the 49-inches long cable from twining and allows you to control the volume easily and mute the mic as effortless volume control one key mute.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars7,447 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
